alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Coleman and northeastern Runnels Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 440 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Winters Lake, or near Winters, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winters, Crews and Lake Winters Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
